resources.string: Click a skate icon to display a rink location. Click the info window to view additional information for that location. This app uses location information.
If this icon is displayed, a public ice rink is available at this location.
Locations with this amenity provide public washrooms.
Locations with this amenity provide public changerooms.
Locations with this amenity have a skate trail in addition to ice rink.
Locations with this amenity offer skate rental services.
This app provides information about public skating rinks and skate trails available in the City of Toronto. It uses an open data set provided by the city for the rink locations and details.
